Aalborg Vikings is a professional basketball team based in Aalborg, Denmark. The club was founded in 1958 and played in the first division Basketligaen from 2010. In the 2014â€“15, they relegated from the Basketligaen. They play 1. division and made it to the semifinals in 2018/2019. Head coach of the 2018/2019 and 2019/2020 teams are Tat Tucker, who has signed deals with the Vikings. The goal of the team is to move back up to Basketligaen and represent North Jylland.
Notable players
* Joe Burton
